head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BLUMENSON, LILLIAN (NEE SHULTZ)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BLUMENSON, LILLIAN (NEE SHULTZ)

block.p: BLUMENSON-Lillian (nee Shultz). 87, of West Palm Beach, FL, formerly of Bronx, NY. Beloved wife of the late George. Devoted mother of Lester and Genia. Dear sister of Cy Shultz and the late Ethel Cooper. Loving grandmother of Ellen and Michael, Bonnie, Stacey and Eric. Cherished great-grandmother of Carly, Adam, Dana, Zachary, Jesse, Ben and Alex. Caring aunt of Shelia and Joel Pollack. Loved and admired by all. She will be in our hearts and memory forever. Graveside services at Riverside Cemetery, Rochelle Park, NJ, Sunday, 10:30AM. For information, please call ''Gutterman-Musicant'' 1-800-522-0588
